Cheesecake

MATCHA GREEN TEA CHEESECAKE

An earthy and delicious matcha green tea cheesecake with a protein boost.

22g
Protein
190
Calories
60m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs15g
Fat9g
Fiber2g
Sugar6g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g cream cheese
  • 120g plain Greek yogurt
  • 60g vanilla whey protein
  • 2 large eggs
  • 2 tbsp matcha powder

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat your oven to 160¬∞C (325¬∞F).

2

Make Crust

Prepare a simple crust and press it into a springform pan.

3

Mix Filling

Beat cream cheese until smooth. Mix in Greek yogurt, whey protein, eggs, and matcha powder.

4

Bake

Pour into the crust and bake for 45 minutes.

5

Cool and Chill

Cool completely before refrigerating for at least 4 hours.

6

Serve

Dust with extra matcha powder before serving.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
